Valuable Aboriginal art collected by Dame Rosie and Michael Horton goes to Australian gallery after Auckland declined https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/valuable-aboriginal-art-collected-by-dame-rosie-and-michael-horton-goes-to-australian-gallery-after-auckland-declined/HHYFPOTW75C6PLGYEGEZQKROMA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/valuable-aboriginal-art-collected-by-dame-rosie-and-michael-horton-goes-to-australian-gallery-after-auckland-declined/HHYFPOTW75C6PLGYEGEZQKROMA/ Jane PhareA Sydney gallery has been gifted a multimillion-dollar Kiwi collection of Aboriginal art. Sun, 01 Sep 2024 03:00:00 +0000 Robert Telford with Suki, who has been the focus of a protracted legal case after she bit another dog in an Auckland park. Suki died last year before her case helped resolve a grey area of the law. Photo / Robert Telford
